FortuneRabbitPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyPrizeSymbol1: During any spin, one or more Prize symbols may appear on the reels.
FortuneRabbitPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyPrizeSymbol2: Each Prize symbol value may range from 0.5x of the total bet amount up to 500x of the total bet amount.
FortuneRabbitPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyPrizeSymbol3: When 5 or more Prize symbols appear anywhere on the reels, wins from all Prize symbols will be awarded.
FortuneRabbitPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFortuneRabbitFeature1: During any spin, the Fortune Rabbit Feature with 8 Fortune Spins may be randomly triggered while the reels are spinning.
FortuneRabbitPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFortuneRabbitFeature2: During the Fortune Rabbit Feature, only Prize symbols will appear on the reels.

BodyMaximumWin1.value: The maximum win amount is %{5000}x of the bet amount.
BodyMaximumWin1.comment: %{5000} is number that needs to be formatted
BodyMaximumWin1.example: The maximum win amount is 5,000x of the bet amount.

FortuneRabbitRules.GeneralRules1: Fortune Rabbit is a 3-reel (3 rows in reels 1 and 3, and 4 rows in reel 2) video slot featuring prize symbols up to 500x.

GeneralRules2.value: The game is played with 10 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
GeneralRules2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be minimum bet level, maximum max level, minimum bet size and maximum bet size in numeric form.
GeneralRules2.example: The game is played with 10 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.05 to 50.

BodyMaximumWin2.value: If the total win in the main game or the Fortune Rabbit Feature reaches %{5000}x of the bet amount, the spin ends.
BodyMaximumWin2.comment: %{5000} is number that needs to be formatted
BodyMaximumWin2.example: If the total win in the main game or the Fortune Rabbit Feature reaches 5,000x of the bet amount, the spin ends.
